alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 5:28PM CDT until May 08 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rich Hill, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Rich Hill, Hume, Rockville, Foster and Worland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
